item.title: Set up Plausible Analytics Community Edition (self-hosted)
item.description: Intro In the search for an open-source Google Analytics alternative, two options stood out Matomo and Plausible. I wanted the tool to be privacy-friendly and that it did not require cookies, avoiding those pesky consent prompts. I did not find a straightforward guide to self-host Plausible with a Google Search Console integration which led me to create this post. Pre-requisite Ensure that your domain’s ownership is confirmed in the Google Search Console.
